Lack of inspiration: Finding the right ideas and inspiration for the book can be a challenge.
Poor time management: Balancing writing with other responsibilities can make it difficult to meet deadlines.
Self-doubt: Self-doubt can lead to a lack of confidence in one's writing abilities.
Overthinking: Spending too much time thinking about the book instead of writing can slow down the writing process.
Distractions: Distractions from the environment or technology can make it difficult to focus on writing.
